name: ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.onpushsubscriptionchange
description: The ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.onpushsubscriptionchange event of the ServiceWorkerGlobalScope interface is fired to indicate a change in push subscription that was triggered outside the application's control, e.g. when browser refresh the push subscription.

refs.name: Push API
refs.description: The definition of 'onpushsubscriptionchange' in the 'Push API' specification.
